name: Cool Steel
description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by <cryo>12%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by <cryo>15%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by <cryo>18%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by <cryo>21%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
